Name: Secret Camera
About the game: Caution ⚠️Contains NTR Stories⚠️ Background of the story I inherited a property in the name of a distant relative who has no family and came to this old rental apartment building. When I open the room where the landlord is located deep in the top floor, I see a complete set of surveillance equipment, as well as a large number of data documents and handwritten notes. Looking through these records, I realized that my relatives had been doing spiritual research on hypnosis and brainwashing for decades, and had used the tenants as experimental subjects to observe and record the results of brainwashing and spiritual transformation. It was like a dream-like treasure trove, and the dark, dark side of the heart followed suit. Game Features Nine tenants with different characteristics, there must be something you like Up to 45 single-person CGs without differential vertical painting Additional multiplayer CGs waiting for players to discover Some CGs are made in Live2D More than 120,000 words Full recall function Character stand-ups Character Q version stand-ups Character profiles Unlocked CGs Simple and easy to understand Qix gameplay Gameplay Use keyboard [↑] [↓] [←] [→] to move along the edges combine with the blank key to draw a line and capture territory to avoid detection by tenants Dodge anything that stops you Pick up items to briefly enhance your abilities Capture tenants by completing a certain percentage of enclosures Torture the captured tenants to unlock CGs Enjoy the exciting CG Special thanks ★Music: 魔王魂
